revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Ruby Path |image = [[File:Ruby Path.png|thumb]] |caption = An overhead map of Ruby Path. |tokens = 43,000 |location = North of Kindle Road. }} '''Ruby Path''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Kanto]]. It has 49 tiles arranged in a 7x7 square, including 7 chest tiles, 17 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 720,600 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Geodude.png|40px]] Geodude|| colspan=2 rowspan=5| <center> N/A |- | [[File:Graveler.png|40px]] Graveler |- | [[File:Machop.png|40px]] Machop |- | [[File:Machoke.png|40px]] Machoke |- | [[File:Slugma.png|40px]] Slugma |}
===Boss Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[File:Magcargo.png|40px]] Magcargo|| <center> 3,703,000 || colspan=3|<center>N/A |}
